description:
Some weight and filters code was copied from nova to oslo-incubator as other projects use it such as cinder.

Now we have code duplicated (and already veering off in different directions) between nova and oslo-incubator including:

 * JsonFilter
 * AvailabilityZoneFilter
 * BaseFilter

This bug proposes to move all of these into only oslo-configurator.

We should also consider, which other host weights and filters should be moved there.

This is part of blueprint entrypoints-plugins - as the BaseFilter and BaseWeight already use stevedore for plugin loading.
title: Use oslo-incubator weights and filters in nova
